definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: end, extremity, only sg.: abs. ´[[ק]]: Ge 19:4 + 3 t.; cstr. [[קְחֵה]] Ju Jdg 6:21 + ; sf. [[קָחֵ֫הוּ]] Ge 47:21 + 4 t.; [[קְחֵיהֶם]] ([[מִ]]) Ez Eze 33:2 (sg.; Ges:§ 93 ss); pl. (cstr.) supplied by [[קְחוֹת]], v. foll.;—

end, of staff Ju Jdg 6:21, rod 1Sa 14:27, 1Sa 14:43, curtains Ex 26:5 = Ex 36:12 (P; cf. [[קָחָה]]); of conduit Is 7:3, river, = mouth v:Is 7:18 (prob.), Jos 15:5, Jos 15:5, Jos 18:19; of field Ge 23:9, valley Jos 15:8, tribe v:Jos 15:21, sea v:Jos 15:2 Nu 34:3 (all P); of territory ([[נְּכוּל]]) Nu 20:16 (JE; just without), Nu 22:36 (E; just within), cf. Ez Eze 25:9 (al. sub

border, outskirts, of city 1Sa 9:27, 1Sa 14:2, Jos 4:19, Jos 18:15, camp Nu 11:1 (JE); esp. to one approaching Ju Jdg 7:17, Jdg 7:19, 2Ki 7:5, 2Ki 7:8, so of armed force Ju Jdg 7:11, people Nu 22:41 (E), Nu 23:13 (JE; emphat. ´[[אֶפֶס ק]]:, opp. [[כֻּלּוֹ]]), mt. Ex 19:12 (E), Jos 18:16 (JE); see also Jos 3:8 (D), v:Jos 3:15 (JE), Ex 13:20 = Nu 33:6, Ex 16:35, Nu 33:37, Jos 13:27 (all P), Ru 3:7. †

condensed term for what is included within extremities, = the whole: [[אֶחָיו]] ´[[מִק]]: Ge 47:2 (J), cf. Ez Eze 33:2; abs. [[מִקִּחֶה]] Ge 19:4 (J) = in (its) entirety; = on all sides, Je 51:31 + Je 50:26 ([[מִקָּחֶה]] for [[מִקֵּץ]], Gie); so [[מִקָּחֵהוּ]] Is 56:11 Di, but om. ´[[מִקּ]]: LXX Du Che Marti.
[[מִקְחֵה]] at the end of  a certain time Jos 9:16 (JE), 2Sa 24:8 + 8 t.
